OOC: There are a few problems with that post.

       1) You didn't check with us about having a second base.
       2) You didn't check with us about having a heavily armed base in 
general.
       3) You should've checked your facts about the amount of weaponry ever 
seen on  
           a ship, there's already a base capable of annihilating other bases 
without 
           moving and one of my characters blew up a planet, albeit 
accidentally.

If you have any questions on our ruling feel free to e-mail hugar at 
hugar_twriker@... with your questions if only because he was too lazy 
to do this himself.

I EXPECT NO REPLIES TO THIS OVER THE GROUP.  ANY REPLY TO THIS SENT THROUGH 
THE GROUP WILL RESULT IN IMMEDIATE MODERATION OF WHOMEVER SENDS SAID REPLY.

--part1_fc.13234c90.298cc7fc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
